name: UFGConsoleCommandManager
comment: Console commands that are non-cheats that can be exposed to the players.

methods.name: GetWorld
methods.comment: Use the Outer Player Controller to get a World.

methods.name: MaterialFlowAnalysis
methods.comment: Perform a MFA analysis. Output is shown in the log.

methods.name: MaterialLookup
methods.comment: Perform a Material Lookup. Output is shown in the log.

methods.name: SetSessionName
methods.comment: Rename the name of this save session, added for older saves that got their name nulled out.

methods.name: SaveWithNewSessionName
methods.comment: Save to a new save with a new session name.

methods.name: TrackAllAkStats
methods.comment: Dumps all known ak stats to the log.

methods.name: TrackAkComponents
methods.comment: Dumps the top playing components to log, grouped either by class or actor playing.

methods.name: TrackAkMemoryPools
methods.comment: Dumps the stats for wwise memory pools to the log.

methods.name: TrackAkComponentsWithNoPositionOrOwner
methods.comment: Dumps all ak components with no position (0,0,0) or owner to the log.

methods.name: FixupBuiltByRecipeInOldSave
methods.comment:
By default this only looks at buildings where the recipe is missing, optionally it can look for a better match and reapply that.
A summary of the buildings fixed up is outputted to the log.

methods.name: DumpFactoryStatsToLog
methods.comment: Dump some stats about the factory to the log such as number of buildings and kilometers of railway built.

methods.name: CopyPlayerCoordinates
methods.comment: Copy the player coordinates to cliboard

methods.name: DumpPlayerCoordinates
methods.comment: Dumps the player coordinates to log, potentially with a label and copy to clipboard
